emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation Required
emailConfirmation.message: Thank you for registering! We've sent a confirmation email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

registration.title: Create Account
registration.subtitle: Join us to start your fitness journey

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.minLength: First name must be at least {{length}} characters long
firstName.maxLength: First name cannot be longer than {{length}} characters

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.minLength: Last name must be at least {{length}} characters long
lastName.maxLength: Last name cannot be longer than {{length}} characters

email.label: Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

phoneNumber.label: Phone Number (Optional)
phoneNumber.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number starting with + followed by country code and number (e.g., +12125551234)

password.label: Password
password.pattern: Your password must include at least one number, one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one special character (@#$%^&+=)

confirmPassword.label: Confirm Password
confirmPassword.mismatch: The passwords you entered do not match

registration.success: Registration successful! Please check your email to confirm your account.

error.emailExists: An account with this email already exists.
error.generic: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
